title: eppaDi kUDuvEn
sahitya:
eppaDi kUDuvEn engE tEDuvEn iraivA iraivA iraivA unnai


anupallavi

  ippaDi nALumE ceppaDi viddai kATTik-karpanai ulagilE kaN kaTTi ATTinAl


caraNam    kAlaiyiravi neTrik-kaNNenavE kANbEn kaDiyaraivum koTrai shaDaiyanenrE pUNbEn
mAlaiyilE andi vANNan vandAn enbEn maNiyiraven sAmi aNi pulittOl enbEn
manakkavi kanavilE maruviya uruvanri unakkinnum dayavillai tanip-perum karuNaiyE
